alert.note: Alert for Garland; Grant; Hot Spring; Jefferson; Pulaski; Saline (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 05 at 2:28PM CDT by NWS Little Rock
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northern Grant, northwestern Jefferson, east central Garland, southeastern Saline, northeastern Hot Spring and southeastern Pulaski Counties through 315 PM CDT... At 228 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Lonsdale to near Hot Springs National Park. Movement was east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Little Rock... Benton... Bryant... Hot Springs Village... Haskell... Shannon Hills... Wrightsville... Redfield... Traskwood... Tull... Lonsdale... Cane Creek... Ironton... East End... Orion... Salem in Saline County... Otter Creek... Alexander... Bauxite... Belfast... MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. These storms may intensify, so be certain to monitor local radio stations and available television stations for additional information and possible warnings from the National Weather Service.

area.areaDesc: Garland; Grant; Hot Spring; Jefferson; Pulaski; Saline
